info.title: ONAP VFC NSLCM SOL005 API
info.description: VFC Network Service Lifecycle Management SOL005 Rest API.

vnfInstanceId.title: Vnfinstanceid
vnfInstanceId.description: Specify the target NS instance where the VNF instances are moved to

vnfProfileId.title: Vnfprofileid
vnfProfileId.description: Specify the VNF instance that is moved.

vnfdId.title: Vnfdid
vnfdId.description: Information sufficient to identify the VNFD which defines the VNF to be instantiated.

vnfFlavourId.title: Vnfflavourid
vnfFlavourId.description: Identifier of the VNF deployment flavour to be instantiated.

vnfInstantiationLevelId.title: Vnfinstantiationlevelid
vnfInstantiationLevelId.description: Identifier of the instantiation level of the deployment flavour to be instantiated.

vnfInstanceName.title: Vnfinstancename
vnfInstanceName.description: Human-readable name of the VNF instance to be created.

AddressRange.title: Addressrange
AddressRange.description: An IP address range to be used.

minAddress.title: Minaddress
minAddress.description: Lowest IP address belonging to the range.

maxAddress.title: Maxaddress
maxAddress.description: Highest IP address belonging to the range.

IpAddressesDataSerialzier.description: List of IP addresses to assign to the extCP instance.

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of the IP addresses.

numDynamicAddresses.title: Numdynamicaddresses
numDynamicAddresses.description: Number of dynamic addresses to assign.

subnetId.title: Subnetid
subnetId.description: Subnet defined by the identifier of the subnet resource in the VIM.

IpOverEthernetAddressData.title: Ipoverethernet
IpOverEthernetAddressData.description: Network address data for IP over Ethernetto assign to the extCP instance.

ipAddresses.description: List of IP addresses to assign to the extCP instance.

CpProtocolData.description: This type represents network protocol data.

cpInstanceId.title: Cpinstanceid
cpInstanceId.description: Identifier of the external CP instance to which this set of configuration parameters is requested to be applied.

linkPortId.title: Linkportid
linkPortId.description: Identifier of a pre-conFigured link port to which the external CP will be associated.

cpProtocolData.description: Parameters for configuring the network protocols on the link port that connects the CP to a VL

VnfExtCpData.description: External CPs of the VNF to be connected to this external VL.

cpdId.title: Cpdid
cpdId.description: The identifier of the CPD in the VNFD.

cpConfig.description: List of instance data that need to be conFigured on the CP instances created from the respective CPD.

ResourceHandle.title: Resourcehandle
ResourceHandle.description: Identifier(s) of the virtualised network resource(s) realizing the VL instance

vimConnectionId.title: Vimconnectionid
vimConnectionId.description: Identifier of the VIM connection to manage the resource.

resourceProviderId.title: Resourceproviderid
resourceProviderId.description: Identifier of the entity responsible for the management of the resource.

resourceId.title: Resourceid
resourceId.description: Identifier of the resource in the scope of the VIM or the resource provider.

vimLevelResourceType.title: Vimlevelresourcetype
vimLevelResourceType.description: String, type of the resource in the scope of the VIM or the resource provider.

ExtLinkPortData.description: This type represents an externallyprovided link port to be used to connect a VNF external connection point to an external VL

id.title: Id
id.description: Provided by the entity that has created the link port

ExtVirtualLinkData.description: This type represents an external VL

extVirtualLinkId.title: Extvirtuallinkid
extVirtualLinkId.description: The identifier of the external VL instance, if provided.

vimId.title: Vimid
vimId.description: Identifier of the VIM that manages this resource.

resourceProviderId.title: Resourceproviderid
resourceProviderId.description: Identifies the entity responsible for the management of this resource.

resourceId.title: Resourceid
resourceId.description: The identifier of the resource in the scope of the VIM or the resource provider.

extLinkPorts.description: Externally provided link ports to be used to connect external connection points to this external VL.

ExtManagedVirtualLinkData.description: This type represents an externally-managed internalVL.

extManagedVirtualLinkId.title: Extmanagedvirtuallinkid
extManagedVirtualLinkId.description: The identifier of the externally-managed internal VL instance,if provided.

virtualLinkDescId.title: Virtuallinkdescid
virtualLinkDescId.description: The identifier of the VLD in the VNFD for this VL.

vimId.title: Vimid
vimId.description: Identifier of the VIMthat manage this resource.

resourceProviderId.title: Resourceproviderid
resourceProviderId.description: Identifies the entity responsible for the management ofthis resource.

resourceId.title: Resourceid
resourceId.description: The identifier of the resource in the scope of the VIM orthe resource provider.

ChangeVnfFlavourDataSerizlizer.description: The type represents the information that is requested to be changed deployment flavour for an existing VNF instance.

vnfInstanceId.title: Vnfinstanceid
vnfInstanceId.description: Identifier of the VNF instance to be modified.

newFlavourId.title: Newflavourid
newFlavourId.description: Identifier of the VNF deployment flavour to be instantiated.

instantiationLevelId.title: Instantiationlevelid
instantiationLevelId.description: Identifier of the instantiation level of the deployment flavour to be instantiated.

extVirtualLinks.description: Information about external VLs to connect the VNF to.

extManagedVirtualLinks.description: Information about internal VLs that are managed by NFVO

additionalParams.title: Additionalparams
additionalParams.description: Additional input parameters for the flavour change process

OperationalStates.title: Changestateto
OperationalStates.description: The desired operational state to change the VNF to.

StopType.title: Stoptype
StopType.description: It signals whether forceful or graceful stop is requested.

OperateVnfData.description: This type represents a VNF instance for which the operational state needs to be changed and the requested new state

gracefulStopTimeout.title: Gracefulstoptimeout
gracefulStopTimeout.description: The time interval to wait for the VNF to be taken out ofservice during graceful stop.

ModifyVnfInfoData.description: This type represents the information that is requested to be modified for a VNF instance.

vnfInstanceName.title: Vnfinstancename
vnfInstanceName.description: New value of the 'vnfInstanceName' attribute in 'VnfInstance', or 'null' to remove the attribute.

vnfInstanceDescription.title: Vnfinstancedescription
vnfInstanceDescription.description: If present, this attribute signals modifications of the 'vnfInstanceDescription' attribute in 'VnfInstance'

vnfPkgId.title: Vnfpkgid
vnfPkgId.description: New value of the 'vnfPkgId' attribute in 'VnfInstance' The value 'null' is not permitted..

vnfConfigurableProperties.title: Vnfconfigurableproperties
vnfConfigurableProperties.description: Modifications to entries in the 'vnfConfigurableProperties' list, as defined below this Table.

metaData.title: Metadata
metaData.description: If present, this attribute signals modifications of certain 'metadata' attribute in 'vnfInstance'.

extensions.title: Extensions
extensions.description: If present,this attribute signals modifications of certain 'extensions' attribute in 'vnfInstance'.

ChangeExtVnfConnectivityData.description: This type describes the information invoked bythe NFVO to change the external VNF connectivity information maintained by the VNFM.

extVirtualLinks.description: Information about external VLs to change

additionalParams.title: Additionalparams
additionalParams.description: Additional parameters passed by the OSS as input to the external connectivity change process

SapData.description: This type represents the information related to a SAP of a NS

sapdId.description: Reference to the SAPD for this SAP.

sapName.title: Sapname
sapName.description: Human readable name for the SAP.

description.title: Description
description.description: Human readable description for the SAP.

sapProtocolData.description: Parameters for configuring the network protocols on the SAP.

AssocNewNsdVersionData.description: Specify the new NSD to be used for the NS instance.

newNsdId.title: Newnsdid
newNsdId.description: Identifier of the new NSD version that is to be associated to the NS instance.

targetNsInstanceId.title: Targetnsinstanceid
targetNsInstanceId.description: Specify the target NS instance where the VNF instances are moved to.

vnfInstanceId.title: Vnfinstanceid
vnfInstanceId.description: Specify the VNF instance that is moved.

NsCpHandle.description: This type represents an identifier of the CP or SAP instance.

vnfInstanceId.title: Vnfinstanceid
vnfInstanceId.description: Identifier of the VNF instance associated to the CPinstance.

vnfExtCpInstanceId.title: Vnfextcpinstanceid
vnfExtCpInstanceId.description: Identifier of the VNF external CP instance in thescope of the VNF instance.

pnfInfoId.title: Pnfinfoid
pnfInfoId.description: Identifier of the PNF instance associated to the CPinstance.

pnfExtCpInstanceId.title: Pnfextcpinstanceid
pnfExtCpInstanceId.description: Identifier of the PNF external CP instance in thescope of the PNF.

nsInstanceId.title: Nsinstanceid
nsInstanceId.description: Identifier of the NS instance associated to the SAPinstance

nsSapInstanceId.title: Nssapinstanceid
nsSapInstanceId.description: Identifier of the SAP instance in the scope of the NSinstance.

Mask.description: Indicates values of specific bits in a frame

startingPoint.title: Startingpoint
startingPoint.description: Indicates the offset between the last bit of the sourcemac address and the first bit of the sequence of bitsto be matched.

length.title: Length
length.description: Indicates the number of bits to be matched

value.title: Value
value.description: Provide the sequence of bit values to be matched.

etherType.title: Ethertype
etherType.description: Indicates the protocol carried over the Ethernet layer

vlanTag.description: ndicates a VLAN identifier in an IEEE 802.1Q-2014 tag

protocol.title: Protocol
protocol.description: Indicates the L4 protocol, For IPv4 [7] this corresponds tothe field called Protocol to identifythe next level protocol

dscp.title: Dscp
dscp.description: For IPv4 [7] a string of 0 and 1 digits that corresponds to the6-bit Differentiated Services Code Point (DSCP) field of theIP header.

sourcePortRange.title: Sourceportrange
sourcePortRange.description: Indicates a range of source ports

destinationPortRange.title: Destinationportrange
destinationPortRange.description: Indicates a range of destination ports

sourceIpAddressPrefix.title: Sourceipaddressprefix
sourceIpAddressPrefix.description: Indicates the source IP address range in CIDRformat.

destinationIpAddressPrefix.title: Destinationipaddressprefix
destinationIpAddressPrefix.description: Indicates the destination IP address rangein CIDRformat.

extendedCriteria.description: Indicates values of specific bits in a frame

NfpData.description: This type contains information used to create or modify NFP instance parameters for the updateof an existing VNFFG instance.

nfpInfoId.description: Identifier of the NFP to be modified.

description.title: Description
description.description: Human readable description for the NFP

nsCpHandle.description: HanIdentifier(s) of the CPs and SAPs which the NFP passes by.

UpdateVnffgData.description: This type specifies the parameters used for the update of an existing VNFFG instance.

vnffgInfoId.description: Identifier of an existing VNFFG to be updated for the NS Instance.

nfpInfoId.description: Identifier(s) of the NFP to be deleted from a given VNFFG.

newNsFlavourId.description: Identifier of the new NS DF to apply to this NS instance.

instantiationLevelId.description: Identifier of the instantiation level of the deployment flavour to be instantiated.

An identifier that is unique within a NS descriptor

removeVnfInstanceId.description: Identifies an existing VNF instance to be removed from the NS instance.

instantiateVnfData.description: Identifies the new VNF to be instantiated.

changeVnfFlavourData.description: Identifies the new DF of the VNF instance to be changed to.

modifyVnfInfoData.description: This type represents the information that is requested to be modified for a VNF instance.

changeExtVnfConnectivityData.description: Specifies the new external connectivity data of theVNF instance to be changed

addSap.description: Identifies a new SAP to be added to the NS instance.

removeSapId.description: The identifier an existing SAP to be removed from the NS instance

removeNestedNsId.description: The identifier of an existing nested NS instance to be removed from the NS instance.

moveVnfInstanceData.description: Specify existing VNF instance to be moved from one NS instance to another NS instance

removeVnffgId.description: The identifier of an existing nested NS instance to be removed from the NS instance

updateVnffg.description: Specify the new VNFFG Information data to be updated for a VNFFG of the NS Instance

modifyPnfData.description: Specifies the PNF to be modified in the NS instance.

removePnfId.description: Identifier of the PNF to be deleted from the NS instance.

type.title: Type
type.description: A URI reference according to IETF RFC 3986 [5] that identifies the problem type.

title.title: Title
title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type.

status.title: Status
status.description: The HTTP status code for this occurrence of the problem.

detail.title: Detail
detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

instance.title: Instance
instance.description: A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem.

additional_details.description: Any number of additional attributes, as defined in a specification or by an implementation.

civicAddressElement.description: Zero or more elements comprising the civicaddress.

countryCode.description: The two-letter ISO 3166 [29] country code in capitalletters.

civicAddressElement.description: Zero or more elements comprising the civicaddress.

VnfLocationConstraint.description: Defines the location constraints for the VNF to be instantiated as part of the NS instantiation.

ParamsForVnf.description: Allows the OSS/BSS to provide additional parameter(s)per VNF instance

vnfProfileId.title: Vnfprofileid
vnfProfileId.description: Identifier of (reference to) a vnfProfile to which theadditional parameters apply

additionalParams.title: Additionalparams
additionalParams.description: Content of civic address element corresponding to thecaType

nsFlavourId.title: Nsflavourid
nsFlavourId.description: Identifier of the NS deployment flavour to beinstantiated.

sapData.description: Create data concerning the SAPs of this NS

addpnfData.description: Information on the PNF(s) that are part of this NS.

vnfInstanceData.description: Specify an existing VNF instance to be used in the NS.

nestedNsInstanceId.description: Specify an existing NS instance to be used as a nested NS within the NS

localizationLanguage.description: Defines the location constraints for the VNF to be instantiated as part of the NS instantiation.

additionalParamForNs.title: Additionalparamforns
additionalParamForNs.description: Allows the OSS/BSS to provide additional parameters at the NS level

additionalParamsForVnf.description: Allows the OSS/BSS to provide additional parameter(s)per VNF instance

startTime.title: Starttime
startTime.description: Timestamp indicating the earliest time to instantiatethe NS.

nsInstantiationLevelId.title: Nsinstantiationlevelid
nsInstantiationLevelId.description: Identifies one of the NS instantiation levelsdeclared in the DF applicable to this NS instance

additionalAffinityOrAntiAffiniityRule.description: Specifies additional affinity or anti-affinity constraint for the VNF instances to be instantiated as part of the NS instantiation.

ScaleNsByStepsData.title: Scalensbystepsdata
ScaleNsByStepsData.description: The information used to scale an NS instance by one or more scaling steps

aspectId.title: Aspectid
aspectId.description: The aspect of the NS that is requested to be scaled, as declared in the NSD.

numberOfSteps.title: Numberofsteps
numberOfSteps.description: The number of scaling steps to be performed. Defaults to 1.

ScaleNsToLevelData.title: Scalenstoleveldata
ScaleNsToLevelData.description: The information used to scale an NS instance to a target size.

nsInstantiationLevel.title: Nsinstantiationlevel
nsInstantiationLevel.description: Identifier of the target NS instantiation level of the current DF to which the NS instance is requested to be scaled.

nsScaleInfo.description: For each NS scaling aspect of the current DF

vnfInstanceToBeAdded.description: An existing VNF instance to be added to the NS instance as part of the scaling operation.

vnfInstanceToBeRemoved.description: The VNF instance to be removed from the NS instance as part of the scaling operation

additionalParamsForNs.title: Additionalparamsforns
additionalParamsForNs.description: Allows the OSS/BSS to provide additional parameter(s) at the NS level necessary for the NS scaling

additionalParamsForVnf.description: Allows the OSS/BSS to provide additional parameter(s) per VNF instance

locationConstraints.description: The location constraints for the VNF to be instantiated as part of the NS scaling.

terminationTime.title: Terminationtime
terminationTime.description: Timestamp indicating the end time of the NS.

ChangedInfo.title: Changedinfo
ChangedInfo.description: Links to resources related to this resource.

AffectedVnfs.description: Information about VNFC instances that were affected during the lifecycle operation.

vnfdId.title: Vnfdid
vnfdId.description: Identifier of the VNFD of the VNF Instance..

vnfProfileId.title: Vnfprofileid
vnfProfileId.description: Identifier of the VNF profile of the NSD.

AffectedPnfs.description: Information about the PNF instances that were affected during the lifecycle operation.

pnfId.title: Pnfid
pnfId.description: Identifier of the affected PNF. This identifier is allocated by the OSS/BSS.

pnfdId.title: Pnfdid
pnfdId.description: Identifier of the PNFD on which the PNF is based.

pnfProfileId.title: Pnfprofileid
pnfProfileId.description: Identifier of the VNF profile of the NSD.

cpInstanceId.title: Cpinstanceid
cpInstanceId.description: Identifier of the NS profile of the NSD.

AffectedVLs.description: Information about the VL instances that were affected during the lifecycle operation

virtualLinkDescId.title: Virtuallinkdescid
virtualLinkDescId.description: Identifier of the VLD in the NSD for this VL.

changeResult.title: Changeresult
changeResult.description: Signals the result of change identified by the 'changeType' attribute.

AffectedVnffgs.description: Information about the VNFFG instances that were affected during the lifecycle operation.

vnffgdId.title: Vnffgdid
vnffgdId.description: Identifier of the VNFFGD of the VNFFG instance.

AffectedNss.description: Information about the nested NS instances that were affected during the lifecycle operation.

nsInstanceId.title: Nsinstanceid
nsInstanceId.description: Identifier of the nested NS instance.

nsdId.title: Nsdid
nsdId.description: Identifier of the NSD of the nested NS instance.

AffectedSaps.description: Information about the SAP instances that were affected during the lifecycle operation.

sapdId.title: Sapdid
sapdId.description: Identifier of the SAPD for this SAP.

sapName.title: Sapname
sapName.description: Human readable name for the SAP.

ResourceChanges.title: Resourcechanges
ResourceChanges.description: It contains information about the cumulative changes to virtualised resources that were performed so far by the LCM operation since its start, if applicable.

affectedVnfs.description: Information about VNFC instances that were affected during the lifecycle operation.

affectedPnfs.description: Information about the PNF instances that were affected during the lifecycle operation.

affectedVls.description: Information about the VL instances that were affected during the lifecycle operation

affectedVnffgs.description: Information about the VNFFG instances that were affected during the lifecycle operation.

affectedNss.description: Information about the nested NS instances that were affected during the lifecycle operation.

affectedSaps.description: Information about the SAP instances that were affected during the lifecycle operation.

LcmOpLink.title: links
LcmOpLink.description: Links to resources related to this resource.

id.title: Id
id.description: Identifier of this NS lifecycle management operation occurrence,

operationState.title: Operationstate
operationState.description: The state of the VNF LCM operation occurrence.

stateEnteredTime.title: Stateenteredtime
stateEnteredTime.description: Date-time when the current state was entered.

startTime.title: Starttime
startTime.description: Date-time of the start of the operation.

nsInstanceId.title: Nsinstanceid
nsInstanceId.description: Identifier of the ns instance to which the operation applies

isAutomaticInvocation.title: Isautomaticinvocation
isAutomaticInvocation.description: Set to true if this NS LCM operation occurrence has been automatically triggered by the NFVO.

operationParams.title: Operationparams
operationParams.description: Input parameters of the LCM operation. This attribute shall be formatted according to the request data type of the related LCM operation. The following mapping between operationType and the data type of this attribute shall apply: 1. INSTANTIATE: InstantiateVnfRequest 2. SCALE: ScaleVnfRequest 3. CHANGE_FLAVOUR: ChangeVnfFlavourRequest4. HEAL: HealVnfRequest 5. TERMINATE: TerminateVnfRequest

isCancelPending.title: Iscancelpending
isCancelPending.description: If the NS LCM operation occurrence is in 'STARTING' or 'PROCESSING' or 'ROLLING_BACK' state and the operation is being cancelled, this attribute shall be set to True. Otherwise, it shall be set to False.

cancelMode.title: Cancelmode
cancelMode.description: The mode of an ongoing cancellation. Shall be present when isCancelPending=true, and shall be None otherwise.

NsInstanceSubscriptionFilter.title: Nsinstancesubscriptionfilter
NsInstanceSubscriptionFilter.description: Filter criteria to select NS instances about which to notify.

nsdIds.description: If present, match NS instances that were created based on a NSD identified by one of the nsdId values listed in this attribute.

vnfdIds.description: If present, match NS instances that contain VNF instances that were created based on identified by one of the vnfdId values listed in this attribute.

pnfdIds.description: If present, match NS instances that contain PNFs that are represented by a PNFD identified by one of the pnfdId values listed in this attribute

nsInstanceIds.description: If present, match NS instances with an instance identifier listed in this attribute

nsInstanceNames.description: If present, match NS instances with a NS Instance Name listed in this attribute.

LifeCycleChangeNotificationsFilter.title: Filter
LifeCycleChangeNotificationsFilter.description: Filter settings for this subscription, to define the of all notifications this subscription relates to A particular notification is sent to the subscriber if the filter matches, or if there is no filter.

operationTypes.description: Match particular NS lifecycle operation types for the notification of type NsLcmOperationOccurrenceNotification.

operationStates.description: Match particular LCM operation state values as reported in notifications of type NsLcmOperationOccurrenceNotification.

nsComponentTypes.description: Match particular NS component types for the notification of type NsChangeNotification.

lcmOpNameImpactingNsComponent.description: Match particular LCM operation names for the notification of type NsChangeNotification.

lcmOpOccStatusImpactingNsComponent.description: Match particular LCM operation status values as reported in notifications of type NsChangeNotification.

LccnSubscriptionLink.title: links
LccnSubscriptionLink.description: Links to resources related to this resource.

callbackUri.title: Callbackuri
callbackUri.description: The URI of the endpoint to send the notification to.

userName.title: Username
userName.description: Username to be used in HTTP Basic authentication.

password.title: Password
password.description: Password to be used in HTTP Basic authentication.

clientId.title: Clientid
clientId.description: Client identifier to be used in the access token request of the OAuth 2.0 client credentials grant type.

clientPassword.title: Clientpassword
clientPassword.description: Client password to be used in the access token request of the OAuth 2.0 client credentials grant type.

tokenEndpoint.title: Tokenendpoint
tokenEndpoint.description: The token endpoint from which the access token can be obtained.

SubscriptionAuthentication.title: Authentication
SubscriptionAuthentication.description: Authentication parameters to conFigure the use of Authorization when sending notifications corresponding to this subscription, as defined in clause 4.5.3 This attribute shall only be present if the subscriber requires authorization of notifications.

authType.description: Defines the types of Authentication / Authorization which the API consumer is willing to accept when receiving a notification.

callbackUri.title: Callbackuri
callbackUri.description: The URI of the endpoint to send the notification to.
